results.content: It would be quite useful for the completed code at the end of each video if only so I can find my typo's :-) Sometimes a bit quick off the code window, especially when you HAVE to copy the code from the screen as none supplied.  The copy code from the screen works though and I think its a good approach. All in all very useful so far....
